name: Mage Of The Dungeon
description:
Hello Gamers hope you are enjoying and playing a lots of games , could do do me a favor can you try my game also. I'm new here and this is my first indie game .

The name of the game is MageoftheDungeon hmm I know the name is not cool but you will enjoy the game.

So, basically the game is top-down shooter RPG  in which we the protagonist is the mage and we are stuck in a dungeon which is full of zombies and to survive we have to eliminate them.

The player/mage is carrying a wand through which he can shoot a fire spell.

And our enemies are zombies in which we have two category the small and the big one .

Each elimination contain one score or one point . Eliminate as many as you can and became the highest scorer. 

Hope you will enjoy it .....please comment if you enjoyed it...

HAPPY PLAYING.....
